message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can shake on it!
Let's split it down the middle, Alice. Fair and square!
You got a good deal in the last round, but I'm willing to give you a bit less this time. Still a good offer, though!
You're being generous with 700k, but I'll take 600k and leave you with 400k. It's a fair trade!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
